planShape.description: Shape of home; includes number of corners (aligned with ERS definitions)

numConditionedFloors.description: Total number of storeys, including basement if applicable

layoutType.description: Layout of storeys; indicates presence of split levels

totalConditionedFloorArea.description: Total conditioned floor area of the building (mÂ²)

location.description: Location details including address, postal code, region, and geolocation coordinates.

address.description: Full street address, e.g., '123 Fake Street'.

addressCivicNumber.description: Civic number of the address, e.g., '123' or '2A'.

addressUnitNumber.description: Unit or apartment number, if applicable.

postalCode.description: Building's postal code or forward sortation area (FSA). Accepts either full code or first 3 characters.

airLeakageRate.description: Air leakage of dwelling at 50 Pa (ACH50). Defaults handled by implementation guidance if not provided.

airLeakageRateAssumed.description: Whether the provided air leakage value is assumed (true) or measured (false).

foundation.description: Details on the building's foundation characteristics.

foundationType.description: Type of foundation. The 'crawlspace' type represents enclosed crawlspaces, while 'piers' includes vented crawlspaces.

foundationWallHeight.description: Foundation total wall height (slab to ceiling, in meters).

foundationWallDepth.description: Foundation wall depth (slab to grade, in meters).

wallTotalArea.description: Total surface area of above-grade walls (mÂ²).

wallInsulation.description: Effective insulation value within above-grade walls (RSI).

atticCeilings.description: Ceiling characteristics for spaces with an attic. When not provided, a ceiling with an attic is assumed by default.

exposedFloors.description: Characteristics of exposed floors, such as those above garages or porches.

exposedFloorAdjacentConditionedSpace.description: Indicates if the underside of the exposed floor is above a conditioned space, such as an enclosed garage.

exposedFloorArea.description: Horizontal surface area of the exposed floor (mÂ²).

exposedFloorInsulation.description: Effective insulation value of the exposed floor (RSI).

windows.description: Details on window characteristics, including geometry, materials, and performance values.

total.description: Total window area for the entire building (mÂ²).

south.description: Total window area on the south face (mÂ²).

southeast.description: Total window area on the southeast face (mÂ²).

east.description: Total window area on the east face (mÂ²).

northeast.description: Total window area on the northeast face (mÂ²).

north.description: Total window area on the north face (mÂ²).

northwest.description: Total window area on the northwest face (mÂ²).

west.description: Total window area on the west face (mÂ²).

southwest.description: Total window area on the southwest face (mÂ²).

glassLayerType.description: Description of the glass layers of the window.

fillGasType.description: Type of gas between panes. Ignored for single-pane windows.

shgc.description: Full-assembly solar heat gain coefficient of the window (fraction).

fractionOperable.description: Area fraction of windows that are operable (total operable area / total window area).

systems.description: The building's heating, cooling, hot water, ventilation, transportation, and distributed energy resource systems

primaryHeating.description: Primary (or auxiliary/back-up for heat pumps) space-heating system.

equipmentSubType.description: Subtype of the heating equipment (ignored for some types).

fuelType.description: Fuel used by the heating system.

capacity.description: Rated heating capacity. If no units are provided, assume kW.

secondaryHeating.description: This section should only be used if information about the primary heating system is provided. It should not be used to model an auxiliary or backup system for a heat pump.

equipmentSubType.description: Subtype of the heating equipment (ignored for some types).

fuelType.description: Fuel used by the heating system.

capacity.description: Rated heating capacity. If no units are provided, assume kW.

heatedFloorArea.description: Heated floor area for the secondary heating system.

efficiency.description: Cooling efficiency value. If no units are provided, SEER is assumed.

efficiencyUnits.description: Units for the provided cooling efficiency.

capacity.description: Rated cooling capacity. If no units are provided, kW is assumed.

manufacturerName.description: Manufacturer name of the cooling system.

modelNumber.description: Model number of the cooling system.

ageOfEquipment.description: Age of the cooling system in years.

cooledFloorArea.description: Cooled floor area (mÂ²), used if the system does not service the entire dwelling.

installed.description: Set to true to indicate the presence of a permanent cooling system without specifying other parameters.

efficiency.description: Cooling efficiency value. If no units are provided, SEER is assumed.

efficiencyUnits.description: Units for the provided cooling efficiency.

capacity.description: Rated cooling capacity. If no units are provided, kW is assumed.

manufacturerName.description: Manufacturer name of the cooling system.

modelNumber.description: Model number of the cooling system.

ageOfEquipment.description: Age of the cooling system in years.

cooledFloorArea.description: Cooled floor area (mÂ²), used if the system does not service the entire dwelling.

installed.description: Set to true to indicate the presence of a temporary cooling system without specifying other parameters.

heatPump.description: Heat pump system details, including type, distribution, performance ratings, and nameplate info.

distributionType.description: Distribution system used by the heat pump.

numberOfHeads.description: Number of indoor heads (for mini-split and multi-split systems).

fuelType.description: Fuel used by the heat pump (non-electric generally not supported).

ratedCoolingTemp.description: Cooling test temperature in Â°C used for rating.

switchoverTemperature.description: Outdoor temperature (Â°C) at/above which the heat pump is configured to run.

equipmentSubType.description: Subtype for combustion/electric tank or tankless systems (ignored for heat pump and combination boiler).

fuelType.description: Fuel used by the DHW system.

equipmentSubType.description: Subtype for combustion/electric tank or tankless systems (ignored for heat pump and combination boiler).

fuelType.description: Fuel used by the DHW system.

ventilation.description: Mechanical ventilation devices and any heat/energy recovery ventilator (HRV/ERV).

bathroomFanCount.description: Number of bathroom fans in the dwelling.

rangeHoodFanCount.description: Number of range hood fans in the dwelling.

otherFanCount.description: Number of other ventilation fans in the dwelling.

recoveryVentilatorEfficiency.description: Heating efficiency (SRE) of the HRV/ERV, in percent.

ageOfRecoveryVentilator.description: Age of the HRV/ERV in years.

solarPv.description: PV system characteristics and nameplate details.

mountingLocation.description: Mounting location of the PV system.

systemTiltAngle.description: Array tilt in degrees from horizontal.

modelNumber.description: Model name/number of the PV system.

modelNumber.description: Model name/number of the energy storage system.

transportation.description: Indicates presence and details of electric vehicles associated with the dwelling.

ageOfVehicle.description: Age of the primary electric vehicle (years).

chargerCapacity.description: Maximum charging rate for the primary EV (kW).

isBidirectional.description: Whether the EV can provide bidirectional power (e.g., as a backup source for the dwelling).

manufacturerName.description: Manufacturer name of the primary electric vehicle.

modelNumber.description: Model name/number of the primary electric vehicle.

occupancy.description: Characteristics of the dwelling related to occupant behaviour.

totalOccupantCount.description: Total number of occupants in the dwelling (count).

occupantCountHomeDuringWeekdays.description: Number of occupants typically at home during weekdays (e.g., work-from-home).

baseLoads.description: Miscellaneous appliance/plug loads and fuels. Set annual consumption to 0 to indicate absence.

clothesWasherConsumption.description: Annual electricity use of clothes washer (kWh/y).

refrigeratorConsumption.description: Annual electricity use of primary refrigerator (kWh/y).

freezerConsumption.description: Annual electricity use of secondary freezer (kWh/y).

cookingRangeOvenFuelType.description: Fuel used by the cooking appliance.

cookingRangeOvenConsumption.description: Annual electricity use of the cooking appliance (kWh/y).

interiorLightingConsumption.description: Annual electricity use of interior lighting (kWh/y).

exteriorLightingConsumption.description: Annual electricity use of exterior lighting (kWh/y).

plugLoadConsumption.description: Annual electricity use of all plug loads (kWh/y).

miscElectricityConsumption.description: Other annual electricity use not already accounted for (kWh/y).
